section.title: Digital products for a better world
section.description: We use the best available technology to help your ideas have the impact they deserve.

webapp.title: Web Applications and Websites
webapp.description: Crafting beautiful, lightning-fast Web applications and websites. We focus on a user-centric design with enhanced performance and optimized SEO, from MVP to full-scale production-ready products.

mobileapp.title: Native and Hybrid Mobile Apps
mobileapp.description: User-centric iOS and Android apps that drive engagement. We build native and hybrid mobile apps that are fast, reliable and secure with a great attention to details.

data.title: Data Science & Machine Learning
data.description: We can help you to extract value and discover new insights from your data. This includes the implementation of systems for automated data processing and visualization, as well as data analysis and machine learning deployment. We also specialize in the latest privacy-enhancing techniques to ensure data can be processed, safely, while sensitive information remains protected.

backend.title: Backend Management
backend.description: We build and maintain the backend of your application, ensuring it is secure, scalable and reliable. We use the best available technology to create solid databases, fast APIs and bulletproof authentication.

contact.title: Contact
contact.contactDescription: Have a question or want to work together? Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.successDescription: We'll get back to you soon.
contact.errorDescription: We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again later or contact us via LinkedIn.

hero.subtitle: We're here to help you build a project that makes a difference.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent and competitive for more impact
pricing.description: We are proud to offer a great value for our senior expertise and highly efficient team work to help you achieve positive goals.

nonprofit.title: Non-profit
nonprofit.description: We help NGOs achieve their goals at a reduced cost.

pro.title: Pro
pro.description: Our full collective dedicated to your success.

support.title: Unlimited Support
support.description: On your side for small changes and bug fixes.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: We are proud to have helped our clients get closer to their UN Sustainable Development Goals.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our clients say
testimonials.henrik: I worked with the Dev for Good Collective for years. They consistently delivered great work with an eye for quality and design. They are proactive, see opportunities, and you can trust them to do what's needed to get the job done.
testimonials.jaime: I would highlight the communication and accountability from their side which helped us to always know the status of the project.

team.title: Who we are
team.description: Friends and developers for 8+ years, we combine our complementary skills for impact.

1.title: Diverse experiences
1.description: We are a group of friends from different countries, united by our shared passion for using technology to make a positive impact. Our diverse backgrounds and complementary skills allow us to tackle challenges from unique angles, resulting in innovative solutions.

2.title: Purpose driven
2.description: Our collective was built on the belief that our work should align with our values. We carefully choose projects that resonate with our commitment to creating meaningful change, ensuring that every line of code we write serves a greater purpose.

3.title: Highly efficient
3.description: Having worked together for years, we've developed a seamless collaboration that makes us highly efficient. When you partner with us, you can trust that we'll listen carefully to your needs while also bringing fresh ideas to the table. Our goal is simple: to build the best product to serve your mission.
